item.description:
VI_PIPE ViPipe = 0; ISP_EXP_INFO_S stExpInfo; HI_MPI_ISP_QueryExposureInfo(ViPipe, &stExpInfo); printf("Sensor exposure time: %d
",stExpInfo.u32ExpTime); printf("Analog Gain: %d
",stExpInfo.u32AGain); printf("Digital Gain: %d
",stExpInfo.u32DGain); printf("ISP Gain: %d
",stExpInfo.u32ISPDGain); printf("Exposure: %d
",stExpInfo.u32Exposure); printf("Average Luminance: %d
",stExpInfo.u8AveLum); printf("Hist error: %d
",stExpInfo.s16HistError); stExpInfo.bExposureIsMAX ? printf("Exposure is MAX!
") : printf("Exposure is NOT MAX!
"); for(i = 0; i < 5; i++) { printf("Hist5Value[%d]: %d
",i,stExpInfo.u16AE_Hist5Value[i]); } _isp_get_iso(void) { uint32_t ret_iso = 0; ISP_EXP_INFO_S stExpInfo ; SOC_CHECK(HI_MPI_ISP_QueryExposureInfo(0, &stExpInfo)); ret_iso = (uint32_t)((unsigned long long)stExpInfo.u32AGain * (unsigned long long)stExpInfo.u32DGain * (unsigned long long)stExpInfo.
